definitions.definition: A person in desperate circumstances or who is at the point of desperation, such as a down-and-outer, addict, etc.

definitions.example: I hadn't eaten in two days and was desperate for food.

definitions.definition: Being filled with, or in a state of despair; hopeless.
definitions.example: I was so desperate at one point, I even went to see a loan shark.

definitions.definition: Without regard to danger or safety; reckless; furious.
Beyond hope; causing despair; extremely perilous; irretrievable.
Extreme, in a bad sense; outrageous.
